title: PUST observes Martyred Intellectuals Day
body: The Pabna University of Science and Technology on Sunday observed Martyred Intellectuals Day by paying rich tribute to the best sons of the soil with due respect. On the occasion of the day, teachers, students, officials and employees wore black badges in the morning. The national flag was hoisted at half-mast at about 8:00am to mark the day. A procession, led by vice-chancellor Professor Dr SM Abdul-Awal, was brought out from the administrative building at about 8:30am. The procession ended at Swadhinata Chattar on the campus after parading different roads. The university administration paid tribute to the martyred intellectuals at Swadhinata Chattar. After paying tribute, vice-chancellor Professor Dr SM Abdul-Awal gave a brief speech there. He remembered the contributions of the martyred intellectuals and the freedom fighters, as well as all the people who sacrificed their lives in different democratic movements of the country. A prayer session was held for the eternal peace of the departed souls of the martyrs.
